name: Narrative Game Elaboration (SallyC) (SallyC)
description:
A 2D narrative & adventure game where players find themselves on the Moon's surface without clues of escaping this place. The story beneath can only be uncovered by wandering around and gather clues. 

Tips:

- Use WASD to move

- Use specific keys to interact with NPCs

- Some clues are hidden in the world, try to wander around and collect them

Audio Sources:  

Walking sound https://freesound.org/people/Unlistenable/sounds/414331/  Closing door sound https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/103635/  Heart Beats https://freesound.org/people/hanstimm/sounds/68475/  Waterfall https://freesound.org/people/Nox_Sound/sounds/511078/  cosmo https://freesound.org/people/ValentinSosnitskiy/sounds/234355/  key get https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/221683/  door https://freesound.org/people/launemax/sounds/274767/  bush https://freesound.org/people/schademans/sounds/2592/  dig https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/96211/  Beep https://freesound.org/people/pan14/sounds/263133/

Source of Poem:
